thread.title: Tributes to Caerphilly man Gavin Horne who died in accident
thread.title_full: Tributes to Caerphilly man Gavin Horne who died in accident - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tributes to Caerphilly man Gavin Horne who died in accident
text: Tributes have been paid to a Caerphilly man who died in a road accident in Monmouthshire. Gavin Horne, 37, died after an incident on the A4042 at Llanellen Bridge, near Abergavenny, on 12 October. His Children Kurtis and Megan said "we are going to miss you", while partner Jane Good called Mr Horne her "soul mate". Police have appealed for witnesses to the accident involving pedestrian Mr Horne that happened at 11:50 BST. Ms Good said: " He had many friends who will miss him dearly and his great sense of humour but he was my wonderful Gavin, my soul mate. " Share this story About sharing
